head.title: Cocoon 2.2 webapp project artifact sucessfully started!

body.p: you have successfully started your own Cocoon 2.2 project based on the 'cocoon-22-archetype-webapp' Maven 2 archetype.

The archetype that you used only loads a reduced set of components. It only includes the most important sitemap components (e.g. the file generator, the XSLT transformer, the XHTML serializer) and Cocoon Forms and Cocoon Template.
